words.meaning: /ə'kɔmədeit/ v. to fit, to provide with something needed
words.vietnamese: điều tiết, làm cho thích nghi, làm cho phù hợp
sự thu xếp, dàn xếp, sắp xếp, sắp đặt

words.meaning: /ə,sousi'eiʃn/ n. an organization of persons or groups having a common interest
words.vietnamese: hội, hội liên hiệp, đoàn thể

words.meaning: /ə'tend/ v. to go to, to pay attention to

words.vietnamese: giữ, chứa, tổ chức, tiến hành

words.meaning: /lou'keiʃn/ n. a place where something happens or exists
words.vietnamese: vị trí, khu đất, hiện trường

words.meaning: /əʊvəˈkraʊdɪd/ adj. with too many people or things
/redʤistə/ v. to record name on an official list
/si'lekt/ v. to choose somebody / something from a group
words.vietnamese: chọn lựa, chọn lọc, tuyển chọn

words.meaning: /seʃn/ n. a period of time that is spent doing a particular activity
v. to be involved in something
